sentence.text: It never ceased to amaze her that she should have given birth to such tall children .
It amazed her that she should find it difficult to tell him .
It never ceased to amaze her how much smaller everything seemed to her now adult eyes .
His revelations amazed the investigators who had believed they were dealing with a limited case .
It amazes me when I think back , how we managed to go without sleep .
It never ceases to amaze me what human beings can do when they have to dig deep .
It still amazes Paul how John can do voices .
` You 'll be amazed what a difference a day or two will make .
His name is Peter Davenport and it just amazed me to watch him . "
Strangely she felt quite calm about it , which amazed her .
He spoke as if this still amazed him .
Jeez , that amazes me , as well as riles me . "
Sometimes the comparisons between the performance of this country and the performance of other countries amazes me .
Marshka never ceased to amaze Vashinov .
When I visited the old housekeeper later that day , I found she was amazed by the news that I was going to marry the master .
Though the front aspect of the hotel was unremarkable , passing through it and along one of the glassed-in corridors , Christina was amazed by the sight she saw .
Candy Morris has amazed doctors at the Radcliffe Infirmary in Oxford .Just two weeks ago her foot was almost severed when she fell into this shredding machine at her own paper baling business .
The size of the place alone amazed her and the bustle confused her .
However , the incredible Liverpool pensioner has amazed hospital staff and family alike with her remarkable recovery .
His demise amazes some of us who consider that his swing and mental approach assured him millionaire status .
When Mother Theresa received the Nobel Peace Prize she amazed the world by giving every penny to the poor of Calcutta .
` Y'y'yes , " I spluttered , amazed once again by the accuracy of his telepathic probing .
Amazed by the Egyptians ' devotion to their cat population , he felt inspired to comment on certain aspects of the behaviour of the felines .
It fascinates , enthralls , amazes , and delights .
